name: siso-internal-autonomous
description: SISO-Internal autonomous task management - spawn sub-agents to complete tasks via Supabase database
author: SISO

params.name: agent_role
params.description: Role: researcher, coder, reviewer, architect, planner, verifier

commands.name: /autonomous spawn
commands.description: Spawn a sub-agent to work on a subtask

params.name: context
params.description: Additional context to pass to the agent

commands.name: /autonomous status
commands.description: Update subtask status and agent metadata

params.name: status
params.description: pending, planned, executing, verifying, completed, failed

params.name: agent_metadata
params.description: Metadata to merge into agent_metadata JSONB

commands.name: /autonomous context
commands.description: Get full context for a subtask (including agent_metadata)

commands.name: /autonomous list
commands.description: List autonomous subtasks for a parent task

commands.name: /autonomous plan
commands.description: Create execution plan for a task (spawns planner agent)

params.name: parent_task_id
params.description: ID of the task to plan
